kv1.6:1.27.pli: Sabbamatthīti yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhīti, yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti, hevamatthīti?

kv1.6:2.3.pli: Nanu atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:2.5.pli: Hañci atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:3.3.pli: Nanu anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:3.5.pli: Hañci anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:4.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ aniruddhaṃ avigataṃ avipariṇataṃ na atthaṅgataṃ na abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:4.3.pli: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ aniruddhaṃ avigataṃ avipariṇataṃ na atthaṅgataṃ na abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:4.5.pli: paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ sañjātaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:4.7.pli: Anāgataṃ atthi anāgataṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ sañjātaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:5.1.pli: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:5.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:5.5.pli: anāgataṃ atthi anāgataṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:5.7.pli: Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:6.3.pli: Nanu atītaṃ rūpaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:6.6.pli: abbhatthaṅgataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:7.3.pli: Nanu anāgataṃ rūpaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:7.6.pli: apātubhūtaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:8.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ aniruddhaṃ avigataṃ avipariṇataṃ na atthaṅgataṃ na abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:8.3.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ aniruddhaṃ avigataṃ avipariṇataṃ na atthaṅgataṃ na abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:9.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ sañjātaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:9.3.pli: Anāgataṃ rūpaṃ atthi anāgataṃ rūpaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ sañjātaṃ nibbattaṃ abhinibbattaṃ pātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:10.1.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:10.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:11.1.pli: Anāgataṃ rūpaṃ atthi anāgataṃ rūpaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:11.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:12.2.pli: saññā atthi, saṅkhārā atthi, viññāṇaṃ atthīti?

kv1.6:12.4.pli: Nanu atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ atthaṅgataṃ abbhatthaṅgatanti?

kv1.6:12.7.pli: abbhatthaṅgataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:13.3.pli: Nanu anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asañjātaṃ anibbattaṃ anabhinibbattaṃ apātubhūtanti?

kv1.6:13.6.pli: apātubhūtaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:14.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniruddhaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:14.4.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniruddhaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:15.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ jātaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:15.4.pli: Anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ jātaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:16.1.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ niruddhaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:16.4.pli: Paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ niruddhaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:16.7.pli: Anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ ajātaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:17.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ ajātaṃ …pe…

kv1.6:18.1.pli: “Paccuppannan”ti vā “rūpan”ti vā, “rūpan”ti vā “paccuppannan”ti vā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?

kv1.6:19.1.pli: “Paccuppannan”ti vā “rūpan”ti vā, “rūpan”ti vā “paccuppannan”ti vā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?

kv1.6:19.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:20.1.pli: “Odātan”ti vā “vatthan”ti vā, “vatthan”ti vā “odātan”ti vā odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?

kv1.6:21.1.pli: “Odātan”ti vā “vatthan”ti vā, “vatthan”ti vā “odātan”ti vā odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāteti?

kv1.6:21.3.pli: Odātaṃ vatthaṃ rajjamānaṃ vatthabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:22.5.pli: Nanu rūpaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:22.7.pli: Hañci rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:23.1.pli: Nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahatīti nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:23.3.pli: Rūpaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:23.5.pli: rūpaṃ rūpabhāvaṃ na jahati rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:23.7.pli: Nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:24.1.pli: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:24.3.pli: Anāgataṃ atthi anāgataṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:24.5.pli: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:24.7.pli: Paccuppannaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:27.1.pli: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:27.5.pli: nanu atītaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:27.7.pli: Hañci atītaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:28.1.pli: Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahatīti nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:28.3.pli: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti atītaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:29.1.pli: Atītaṃ atthi atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahati atītaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:29.3.pli: Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:30.1.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:30.3.pli: Anāgataṃ rūpaṃ atthi anāgataṃ rūpaṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:30.5.pli: atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:30.7.pli: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:31.1.pli: Anāgataṃ rūpaṃ atthi anāgataṃ rūpaṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:31.3.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:32.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:32.3.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:33.1.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:33.3.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:33.5.pli: nanu atītaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:33.8.pli: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:33.9.pli: “atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatī”ti.

kv1.6:34.1.pli: Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:34.3.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahati atītaṃ rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:35.1.pli: Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthi atītaṃ rūpaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahati atītaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:35.3.pli: Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:36.4.pli: atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:36.6.pli: Anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:36.8.pli: atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:36.10.pli: Paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:37.1.pli: Anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:37.3.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:38.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:38.3.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ jahatīti?

kv1.6:39.1.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti?

kv1.6:39.3.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:39.5.pli: nanu atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:39.7.pli: Hañci atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:39.8.pli: “atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatī”ti.

kv1.6:40.1.pli: Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:40.3.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahati atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:41.1.pli: Atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahati atītaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:41.3.pli: Nibbānaṃ atthi nibbānaṃ nibbānabhāvaṃ na jahati nibbānaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?

kv1.6:42.3.pli: Hañci atītaṃ nvatthi, atītaṃ atthīti micchā.

kv1.6:42.4.pli: Hañci vā pana atthi nvātītaṃ, atthi atītanti micchā.

kv1.6:42.7.pli: Hañci anāgataṃ nvatthi, anāgataṃ atthīti micchā.

kv1.6:42.8.pli: Hañci vā pana atthi nvānāgataṃ, atthi anāgatanti micchā.

kv1.6:43.11.pli: Na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti?

kv1.6:44.11.pli: Na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti?

kv1.6:45.1.pli: Anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hoti, paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hotīti?

kv1.6:45.3.pli: Taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītanti?

kv1.6:45.5.pli: taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītanti?

kv1.6:45.11.pli: Na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti?

kv1.6:46.1.pli: Atītaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:46.5.pli: atītaṃ sotaṃ atthi saddā atthi sotaviññāṇaṃ atthi ākāso atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:46.9.pli: atītaṃ ghānaṃ atthi gandhā atthi ghānaviññāṇaṃ atthi vāyo atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:46.13.pli: atītā jivhā atthi rasā atthi jivhāviññāṇaṃ atthi āpo atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:46.17.pli: atīto kāyo atthi phoṭṭhabbā atthi kāyaviññāṇaṃ atthi pathavī atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:46.21.pli: atīto mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:47.1.pli: Anāgataṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:47.9.pli: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthīti?

kv1.6:48.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena cakkhunā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:48.3.pli: Atītaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, atītena cakkhunā atītaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:48.9.pli: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena manena paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:48.11.pli: Atīto mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, atītena manena atītaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:49.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena cakkhunā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:49.3.pli: Anāgataṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, anāgatena cakkhunā anāgataṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:49.9.pli: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena manena paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:49.11.pli: Anāgato mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, anāgatena manena anāgataṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:50.1.pli: Atītaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca atītena cakkhunā atītaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:50.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca paccuppannena cakkhunā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:50.9.pli: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca atītena manena atītaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:50.11.pli: Paccuppanno mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca paccuppannena manena paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:51.1.pli: Anāgataṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca anāgatena cakkhunā anāgataṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:51.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ cakkhuṃ atthi rūpā atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atthi āloko atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca paccuppannena cakkhunā paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv1.6:51.9.pli: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca anāgatena manena anāgataṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:51.11.pli: Paccuppanno mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, na ca paccuppannena manena paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:52.7.pli: Tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:53.7.pli: Tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:54.1.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:54.3.pli: Atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:54.5.pli: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:54.7.pli: Atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:54.9.pli: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:54.11.pli: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:54.13.pli: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:54.15.pli: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:55.1.pli: Atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:55.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:55.5.pli: atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:55.7.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:56.1.pli: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:56.3.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?

kv1.6:56.5.pli: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:56.7.pli: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv1.6:61.1.pli: Puthujjanassa atīto rāgo atthi, puthujjano tena rāgena sarāgoti?

kv1.6:61.3.pli: Arahato atīto rāgo atthi, arahā tena rāgena sarāgoti?

kv1.6:61.6.pli: atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi puthujjano tena anottappena anottappīti?

kv1.6:61.8.pli: Arahato atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, arahā tena anottappena anottappīti?

kv1.6:62.1.pli: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:62.3.pli: Anāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, anāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:62.6.pli: atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:62.8.pli: Anāgāmissa atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, anāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:63.1.pli: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:63.3.pli: Sakadāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, sakadāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:63.6.pli: atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:63.8.pli: Sakadāgāmissa atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, sakadāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:64.1.pli: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:64.3.pli: Sotāpannassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, sotāpanno tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:64.6.pli: atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, puthujjano tena mohena samohoti?

kv1.6:64.8.pli: Sotāpannassa atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, sotāpanno tena mohena samohoti?

kv1.6:65.1.pli: Arahato atīto rāgo atthi, na ca arahā tena rāgena sarāgoti?

kv1.6:65.3.pli: Puthujjanassa atīto rāgo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena rāgena sarāgoti?

kv1.6:65.6.pli: atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, na ca arahā tena anottappena anottappīti?

kv1.6:65.8.pli: Puthujjanassa atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, na ca puthujjano tena anottappena anottappīti?

kv1.6:66.1.pli: Anāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca anāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:66.3.pli: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:66.6.pli: atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, na ca anāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:66.8.pli: Puthujjanassa atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:67.1.pli: Sakadāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca sakadāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:67.3.pli: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:67.6.pli: atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, na ca sakadāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:67.8.pli: Puthujjanassa atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?

kv1.6:68.1.pli: Sotāpannassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca sotāpanno tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:68.3.pli: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?

kv1.6:68.6.pli: atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, na ca sotāpanno tena mohena samohoti?

kv1.6:68.8.pli: Puthujjanassa atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, na ca puthujjano tena mohena samohoti?

kv1.6:69.15.pli: Atītasmiṃ kucchismiṃ sati jighacchā pipāsā paññāyatīti?

kv1.6:70.3.pli: Atīto kāyo paggahaniggahupago chedanabhedanupago kākehi gijjhehi kulalehi sādhāraṇoti?

kv1.6:70.5.pli: atīte kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?

kv1.6:70.7.pli: labbhā atīto kāyo addubandhanena bandhituṃ, rajjubandhanena bandhituṃ, saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhituṃ, gāmabandhanena bandhituṃ, nigamabandhanena bandhituṃ, nagarabandhanena bandhituṃ, janapadabandhanena bandhituṃ, kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitunti?

kv1.6:72.1.pli: Atīto rūpakkhandho atthi, anāgato rūpakkhandho atthi, paccuppanno rūpakkhandho atthīti?

kv1.6:72.5.pli: atītā pañcakkhandhā atthi, anāgatā pañcakkhandhā atthi, paccuppannā pañcakkhandhā atthīti?

kv1.6:73.1.pli: Atītaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi, paccuppannaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthīti?

kv1.6:73.5.pli: atītāni dvādasāyatanāni atthi, anāgatāni dvādasāyatanāni atthi, paccuppannāni dvādasāyatanāni atthīti?

kv1.6:74.1.pli: Atītā cakkhudhātu atthi, anāgatā cakkhudhātu atthi, paccuppannā cakkhudhātu atthīti?

kv1.6:74.5.pli: atītā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthi, anāgatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthi, paccuppannā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthīti?

kv1.6:75.1.pli: Atītaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthi, paccuppannaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthīti?

kv1.6:75.5.pli: atītāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthi, anāgatāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthi, paccuppannāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthīti?

kv1.6:76.1.pli: Atīto rājā cakkavattī atthi, anāgato rājā cakkavattī atthi, paccuppanno rājā cakkavattī atthīti?

kv1.6:77.1.pli: Atīto sammāsambuddho atthi, anāgato sammāsambuddho atthi, paccuppanno sammāsambuddho atthīti?

kv1.6:79.2.pli: Hañci atītaṃ atthi, atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītanti.

kv1.6:79.5.pli: ‘atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:80.1.pli: No ce pana atītaṃ nvātītaṃ nvātītaṃ atītanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:80.2.pli: “atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītan”ti.

kv1.6:80.5.pli: ‘atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:82.2.pli: Hañci anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatanti.

kv1.6:82.5.pli: ‘anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:83.1.pli: No ce panānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ anāgatanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:83.2.pli: “anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgatan”ti.

kv1.6:83.5.pli: ‘anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:84.4.pli: Atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannanti.

kv1.6:85.2.pli: Hañci paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannanti.

kv1.6:85.5.pli: ‘paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:86.1.pli: No ce pana paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:86.2.pli: “paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannan”ti.

kv1.6:86.5.pli: ‘paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:87.4.pli: Atthi siyā nibbānaṃ siyā no nibbānanti.

kv1.6:88.2.pli: Hañci nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānanti.

kv1.6:88.5.pli: ‘nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:89.1.pli: No ce pana nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv1.6:89.2.pli: “nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānan”ti.

kv1.6:89.5.pli: ‘nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānan’”ti micchā.

kv1.6:90.5.pli: “yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā—

kv1.6:90.10.pli: yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā—

kv1.6:90.14.pli: Tena hi atītaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ atthīti.

kv1.6:91.4.pli: “tayome, bhikkhave, niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṅkiṇṇā asaṅkiṇṇapubbā na saṅkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.

kv1.6:91.6.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;

kv1.6:91.7.pli: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.

kv1.6:91.11.pli: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;

kv1.6:91.12.pli: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.

kv1.6:92.1.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;

kv1.6:92.2.pli: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.

kv1.6:92.6.pli: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;

kv1.6:92.7.pli: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.

kv1.6:93.1.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;

kv1.6:93.2.pli: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.

kv1.6:93.6.pli: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;

kv1.6:93.7.pli: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.

kv1.6:93.8.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṅkiṇṇā asaṅkiṇṇapubbā na saṅkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.

kv1.6:94.1.pli: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṃ ukkalā vassabhaññā ahetukavādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā, tepime tayo niruttipathe adhivacanapathe paññattipathe na garahitabbaṃ na paṭikkositabbaṃ amaññiṃsu.

kv1.6:95.4.pli: “atthi nu kho taṃ, bhante, cakkhuṃ yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyāti.

kv1.6:95.5.pli: Atthi nu kho sā, bhante, jivhā …pe…

kv1.6:95.6.pli: atthi nu kho so, bhante, mano yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti.

kv1.6:96.1.pli: “Natthi kho taṃ, phagguna, cakkhuṃ yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya.

kv1.6:96.3.pli: natthi nu kho so, phagguna, mano yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti.

kv1.6:97.4.pli: “ahu pubbe lobho tadahu akusalaṃ, so etarahi natthi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.

kv1.6:97.6.pli: ahu pubbe moho, tadahu akusalaṃ, so etarahi natthi, iccetaṃ kusalan”ti.

kv1.6:98.5.pli: “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā;

kv1.6:98.7.pli: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.

kv1.6:98.8.pli: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.

kv1.6:98.9.pli: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.

kv1.6:98.10.pli: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.

kv1.6:98.11.pli: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, sasokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, sarajaṃ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.

kv1.6:99.3.pli: viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī …pe…

kv1.6:100.4.pli: “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo, natthi nandī, natthi taṇhā;

kv1.6:100.6.pli: Yattha viññāṇaṃ appatiṭṭhitaṃ avirūḷhaṃ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.

kv1.6:100.7.pli: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.

kv1.6:100.8.pli: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.

kv1.6:100.9.pli: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.

kv1.6:100.10.pli: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, asokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, arajaṃ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.

kv1.6:101.3.pli: viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo, natthi nandī …pe…
